name: TetraScience
headline: The only R&D data cloud for life sciences
description: TetraScience provides the world’s first and only R&D Data Cloud, with a mission to transform life sciences R&D, accelerate discovery, and improve human life. Scientists at global pharma and biotech organizations rely on our innovative Tetra Data Platform for easy access to centralized, harmonized, and actionable scientific data to accelerate their digital lab transformation. With best-in-class SaaS performance, a team of industry innovators, and excellent product/market fit, Tetra is positioned to become an iconic life sciences software company.

# The Scientific Data and AI Cloud
TetraScience liberates, unifies, and transforms your raw data into more-than-FAIR, AI-native data. We bring this AI-native data to life in a rapidly growing suite of next-generation lab data management solutions, scientific use cases, and AI-based scientific outcomes. 
[Get a demo](https://www.tetrascience.com/</demo>)
[Start your AI data journey](https://www.tetrascience.com/<#start>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c764f3c085f7f8b4c8ba0c_ico_chevron.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c68f8ee1387d0beae_AstraZeneca.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c67ae354bf99f8972_AmGen.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c417f99e3ff94c620_Genetech.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c440c1238e7e58c63_Novartis%20Logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c061c1044c0a3b867_Regeneron.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458da02e9dc496fcf506fb_Merck.svg)
## The world's only data and AI cloud built for science
TetraScience is _sui generis_ , designed from the ground up, technically and commercially, to enable Scientific AI. 
### Purpose-built
Combines unparalleled expertise in science, modern data stacks, and AI to harness the value of scientific data
### Open and vendor-agnostic
Vendor-agnostic data stack and data-only business model prevents proprietary walled gardens and vendor lock-in, future-proofing customer data
### Collaborative
Enables unprecedented data liquidity and AI collaboration among our scientific customers and their partners 
### AI-native
Industrialized production of the world's only large-scale, liquid, engineered, and compliant scientific datasets to fuel Scientific AI
#### 10x
higher scientist productivity
#### 40x
faster production insights
#### 60%
earlier time to market
## A revolutionary scientific data paradigm 
TetraScience is shattering the century-old scientific data silo paradigm, which has led to ever less efficient and more costly science by building a revolutionary, future-proof scientific data and AI foundation. For the first time, organizations can have the best of both worlds—next-generation lab data automation and scientific data management, as well as the foundational building blocks for Scientific AI. 
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/</tetra-data>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767f9a111ff8d8dc24eeb_hero_icons.svg)
### Raw data
Trapped in vendor silos, yielding subscale, proprietary, and/or unstructured data with little to no utility for predictive analytics and AI 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767faa111ff8d8dc24fa4_hero_icons-1.svg)
### Replatformed data
Liberated from silos, data is now unified in the cloud, contextualized for scientific use cases, and enabled for advanced lab automation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767f9a111ff8d8dc24f59_hero_icons-2.svg)
### Engineered data
Transformed from proprietary formats to sophisticated and industrialized scientific taxonomies and ontologies, generating AI-native datasets 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767f9a111ff8d8dc24f43_hero_icons-3.svg)
### Tetra X data
Shareable and extensible AI-native data enables collaboration across customers, CROs, CDMOs, and third parties, yielding unprecedented data liquidity and scale, richer taxonomies and ontologies, and continuously improving AI-based outcomes 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767faa111ff8d8dc24fd6_hero_icons-4.svg)
### Tetra AI
Peerless expertise, spanning scientific data and use cases, and modern data and AI stacks, enables TetraScience to uniquely turn raw data into transformational Scientific AI outcomes

## Explore the Tetra Scientific Data and AI Cloud
Learn about the transformative power of the Tetra Scientific Data and AI Cloud, which enables science in unprecedented ways.
## Derive value at every step in the scientific data and AI journey
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a048d_ico_data-replatforming.svg)
### Data replatforming
Automate the assembly and contextualization of your data in a purpose-built cloud, enabling next-gen lab data automation and management. 
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/</platform/data-replatforming>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a04d2_ico_data-analytics.svg)
### Data analytics
Generate new insights by harnessing engineered data that is optimized for dashboards, visualization tools, and analytics applications. Bring your own apps or leverage our partners. 
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/</platform/analytics>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a049f_ico_data-engineering.svg)
### Data engineering
Benefit from industrialized scientific taxonomies and ontologies, which enable advanced analytics and scientific AI. 
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/</platform/data-engineering>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a04b7_ico_ai-alt.svg)
### AI
Achieve groundbreaking AI-driven, scientific outcomes across the value chain with replatformed and engineered Tetra Data. 
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/</platform/ai>)
## Add value and reduce risks at each stage of your journey
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a0498_ico_gxp-compliance.svg)
### GxP compliance
Ensure data integrity and streamline your compliance efforts with traceable and secure data, and adhere to industry standards and guidelines.
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/</platform/gxp-compliance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/67a4ce34bd1855a55820b89b_Sciborg%20homepage%20icon%2060x60.png)
### Tetra Sciborgs
Capitalize on unparalleled expertise at the nexus of scientific use cases, engineered data, and AI to accelerate outcome-based engagements while benefitting from industry best practices and benchmarking. 
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/</platform/tetra-sciborgs>)
## Customer outcomes
Our customers achieve materially improved outcomes, including increased scientific, IT, and data science productivity, reduced research, development, and manufacturing costs, as well as lower risks across the scientific value chain.
#### 12x time saved
on automated data migration
Alexion has been able to completely eliminate manual data transfers, saving 80 hours per month, while substantially reducing data errors.
#### 7x faster
time to insight
Alexion has been able to decrease their time to insight and ensure data integrity with a FAIR-data-powered, cloud-enabled workflow and automated data processing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76bdc941b67ede839510e_alexion_img.png)
See how Alexion improves scientific outcomes by 10%
[Learn more](https://www.tetrascience.com/<https:/go.tetrascience.com/case-studies_accelerating-bioprocessing-purification-at-alexion.html>)

# The Scientific Data and AI Cloud
TetraScience liberates, unifies, and transforms your raw data into more-than-FAIR, AI-native data. We bring this AI-native data to life in a rapidly growing suite of next-generation lab data management solutions, scientific use cases, and AI-based scientific outcomes. 
Get a demo⟨37⟩
Start your AI data journey⟨41⟩![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c764f3c085f7f8b4c8ba0c_ico_chevron.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c68f8ee1387d0beae_AstraZeneca.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c67ae354bf99f8972_AmGen.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c417f99e3ff94c620_Genetech.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c440c1238e7e58c63_Novartis%20Logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458d9c061c1044c0a3b867_Regeneron.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65450e7c20e576420c19daf0/65458da02e9dc496fcf506fb_Merck.svg)
## The world's only data and AI cloud built for science
TetraScience is _sui generis_ , designed from the ground up, technically and commercially, to enable Scientific AI. 
### Purpose-built
Combines unparalleled expertise in science, modern data stacks, and AI to harness the value of scientific data
### Open and vendor-agnostic
Vendor-agnostic data stack and data-only business model prevents proprietary walled gardens and vendor lock-in, future-proofing customer data
### Collaborative
Enables unprecedented data liquidity and AI collaboration among our scientific customers and their partners 
### AI-native
Industrialized production of the world's only large-scale, liquid, engineered, and compliant scientific datasets to fuel Scientific AI
#### 10x
higher scientist productivity
#### 40x
faster production insights
#### 60%
earlier time to market
## A revolutionary scientific data paradigm 
TetraScience is shattering the century-old scientific data silo paradigm, which has led to ever less efficient and more costly science by building a revolutionary, future-proof scientific data and AI foundation. For the first time, organizations can have the best of both worlds—next-generation lab data automation and scientific data management, as well as the foundational building blocks for Scientific AI. 
Learn more⟨19⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767f9a111ff8d8dc24eeb_hero_icons.svg)
### Raw data
Trapped in vendor silos, yielding subscale, proprietary, and/or unstructured data with little to no utility for predictive analytics and AI 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767faa111ff8d8dc24fa4_hero_icons-1.svg)
### Replatformed data
Liberated from silos, data is now unified in the cloud, contextualized for scientific use cases, and enabled for advanced lab automation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767f9a111ff8d8dc24f59_hero_icons-2.svg)
### Engineered data
Transformed from proprietary formats to sophisticated and industrialized scientific taxonomies and ontologies, generating AI-native datasets 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767f9a111ff8d8dc24f43_hero_icons-3.svg)
### Tetra X data
Shareable and extensible AI-native data enables collaboration across customers, CROs, CDMOs, and third parties, yielding unprecedented data liquidity and scale, richer taxonomies and ontologies, and continuously improving AI-based outcomes 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c767faa111ff8d8dc24fd6_hero_icons-4.svg)
### Tetra AI
Peerless expertise, spanning scientific data and use cases, and modern data and AI stacks, enables TetraScience to uniquely turn raw data into transformational Scientific AI outcomes
## Unlock your data's value from discovery to commercialization
All use cases
![⟨42⟩Research](https://www.tetrascience.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)![⟨43⟩Development](https://www.tetrascience.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)![⟨44⟩Manufacturing / QC](https://www.tetrascience.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)

## Explore the Tetra Scientific Data and AI Cloud
Learn about the transformative power of the Tetra Scientific Data and AI Cloud, which enables science in unprecedented ways.
## Derive value at every step in the scientific data and AI journey
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a048d_ico_data-replatforming.svg)
### Data replatforming
Automate the assembly and contextualization of your data in a purpose-built cloud, enabling next-gen lab data automation and management. 
Learn more⟨8⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a04d2_ico_data-analytics.svg)
### Data analytics
Generate new insights by harnessing engineered data that is optimized for dashboards, visualization tools, and analytics applications. Bring your own apps or leverage our partners. 
Learn more⟨10⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a049f_ico_data-engineering.svg)
### Data engineering
Benefit from industrialized scientific taxonomies and ontologies, which enable advanced analytics and scientific AI. 
Learn more⟨9⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a04b7_ico_ai-alt.svg)
### AI
Achieve groundbreaking AI-driven, scientific outcomes across the value chain with replatformed and engineered Tetra Data. 
Learn more⟨11⟩
## Add value and reduce risks at each stage of your journey
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/66c76a9a806e6367b94a0498_ico_gxp-compliance.svg)
### GxP compliance
Ensure data integrity and streamline your compliance efforts with traceable and secure data, and adhere to industry standards and guidelines.
Learn more⟨6⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c75d57c5c045d15a7781e0/67a4ce34bd1855a55820b89b_Sciborg%20homepage%20icon%2060x60.png)
### Tetra Sciborgs
Capitalize on unparalleled expertise at the nexus of scientific use cases, engineered data, and AI to accelerate outcome-based engagements while benefitting from industry best practices and benchmarking. 
Learn more⟨7⟩
## Customer outcomes
Our customers achieve materially improved outcomes, including increased scientific, IT, and data science productivity, reduced research, development, and manufacturing costs, as well as lower risks across the scientific value chain.
#### 12x time saved
on automated data migration
Alexion has been able to completely eliminate manual data transfers, saving 80 hours per month, while substantially reducing data errors.
#### 7x faster
time to insight
Alexion has been able to decrease their time to insight and ensure data integrity with a FAIR-data-powered, cloud-enabled workflow and automated data processing.

generated_description:
### TetraScience: A Pioneer in R&D Data Clouds for Life Sciences

TetraScience is on a noble mission: to reshape how research and development (R&D) data is utilized in life sciences. Founded in Boston, and proud to be part of Y Combinator's Batch S15, TetraScience is the first and only R&D data cloud dedicated to transforming scientific research and improving human life. With a passionate team of about 100 professionals, the company is leveraging cutting-edge technology to deliver actionable scientific data to laboratories worldwide.

#### What They Do

At the heart of TetraScience's offering is the Tetra Data Platform, a robust solution that centralizes, harmonizes, and empowers scientific data. With it, scientists in global pharmaceuticals and biotech can streamline their digital transformation, improving efficiency and accelerating discoveries. The platform's SaaS performance is among the best in class, making TetraScience uniquely positioned to become a game-changer in the life sciences software space.

#### Innovative Initiatives

TetraScience is not just about data management; they are also delving into the realm of artificial intelligence (AI). They have introduced the concept of "Sciborgs™"—highly skilled profiles that can transform raw scientific data into foundational blocks for AI. Collaborations with industry giants, including Microsoft, aim to enhance AI capabilities in scientific applications at scale.

Current offerings include:
- **Scientific Data and AI Cloud**: This provides a comprehensive cloud platform for sophisticated data management tailored for scientific purposes.
- **GxP Compliance**: Ensuring that data integrity and traceability align with industry standards.
- **Data Engineering and Analytics**: Helping clients harness their re-platformed data for profound insights and analysis.

#### Real-World Impact

TetraScience is focused on tangible results. Its platform promises to increase productivity drastically—reporting a 10x boost in scientist efficiency, 40x faster insights, and a remarkable 60% reduction in the time to market for innovations. Customers like Alexion have documented substantial improvements in their operations, including significant time and cost savings on data management tasks.

#### Conclusion

TetraScience embodies the innovative spirit that drives progress in life sciences. By wrapping advanced data management in a cloud-based platform designed specifically for research, they are paving the way for a new era of scientific discovery. For any life sciences organization looking to improve data utilization and enhance research outcomes, TetraScience stands out as a valuable partner in the quest for knowledge and innovation.

For more information, visit [TetraScience](https://www.tetrascience.com).
